alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Magoffin; Morgan; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 3:50PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Morgan, north central Breathitt, northwestern Magoffin and central Wolfe Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 350 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Calaboose to Lewis. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Lewis, Holliday, Caney, Stacy Fork, Well Station, Cannel City, Malone, Payton, Panama and Lizzielane around 355 PM EDT. Harper, Lykins, Netty, Burg and Wheel Rim around 400 PM EDT. Patton, Bethanna, Hager, Epson, Cutuno and Daysboro around 405 PM EDT. Gifford, Elsie, Malaga, Kernie, Stella, Lexie, Ova, Lower Gilmore and Dale around 410 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Simpson, Paxton, Gullett, Upper Gilmore, Rosefork, Shockey, Gilmore, Lee City, Helechawa and Belknap. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
